short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help the best and worst websites across the internet stick out with SoreThumb - the leading website reviewer worldwide.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With SoreThumb, you'll get instant community-driven ratings for search results, helping you make informed decisions about which links to trust and visit.

Features:
🌟 Community Ratings at a Glance:
Instantly see likes and dislikes for each website in your search results. SoreThumb aggregates user votes to highlight the most trusted sites and flag the less reliable ones.

🔒 Enhanced Online Safety:
Avoid scams and phishing attempts by steering clear of poorly rated websites. SoreThumb’s community-driven ratings can help protect you from malicious sites.

🔍 Seamless Search Experience:
No more second-guessing which link to click. With ratings displayed right in your search results, SoreThumb streamlines your browsing, saving you time and enhancing your search efficiency.

👥 Personalized Browsing:
Remember which sites you’ve previously liked or disliked. Your individual votes are stored, helping you tailor your web experience to your preferences.

📈 Feedback for Webmasters:
Website owners can gain valuable insights into user perceptions, enabling them to improve their content and user experience based on real feedback.

Join the SoreThumb community today and enhance your web browsing experience. Whether you're researching, shopping, or simply surfing the web, SoreThumb makes sure you see the best and avoid the worst the internet has to offer.
